title: I have been preparing for 1 year for the bank exam, but I failed all the exams. I got only below 20 marks. Should I quit preparing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Don't quit until you have some other better options. The moment you have realised that bank exam is your last resort. The very next year you are going to clear it. You will start counting in hours rather than years. You will work day and night. You will become an inspiration for generations to come.
